recruiterInsights.overview: Quick campus placement perspective while AI is offline: Some relevant technical skills visible. Project experience shows initiative. This is just a surface scan though.
technicalStrengths: Found these skills: javascript, react, html, css, node
areasForImprovement: Use active verbs at the start of bullets
Reduce paragraphs to concise bullet points
placementAdvice: Add one deployed project with README
recommendations: Convert responsibilities to achievements with metrics
Add dates and titles for all roles
Include 6-10 core skills relevant to the role

technicalStories: Built a component library to standardize UI and reduce dev time
hrQuestionPrep: Describe a time you solved a UI bug

placementStrategy.priorityCompanies: Start with service companies; then apply to React-focused startups
placementStrategy.portfolioGaps: Add live links and concise READMEs

analysis.finalAssessment: You have relevant skills and projects. Focus on bullet quality, metrics, and deployed demos to stand out.
